name: macos-system
description: Control macOS system features via AppleScript
author: Example

command.description: Action to perform: volume (set), apps (launch/quit/get), dark-mode (toggle), battery (status)

level.description: System audio volume percentage (0-100). Required for setVolume command

app_name.description: Exact app name as shown in /Applications. Required for launch/quit commands

force.description: Use force quit if app not responding. Default: false (graceful quit)

result.description: Operation result: volume level, app state, dark mode status, battery info, or error if failed
